items.name: Rework
items.snippet: Loved the format and subject matter. Changed the way I view many established rules in the business.

items.name: A Book Apart series
items.snippet: Read most of them by now and liked that they were specific and to the point. Full of good examples. Written by industry greats.

items.name: Gaming
items.snippet: I play games on console, and Team Fortress 2 on my mac.

items.name: Reading
items.snippet: I don't just read technical books, I also like to read novels.

items.name: Music
items.snippet: I listen to almost any genre of music. Used to play drums, would like to play again in the future.

items.name: Cooking
items.snippet: I like to try new things in the kitchen (or on the grill). I don;t always succeed, but practice makes perfect.
